title: Girls barred from class: Unease in BJP sections, attempt to dial down - The Indian Express
content: Girls barred from class: Unease in BJP sections, attempt to dial down  The Indian ExpressView Full coverage on Google News
description: Sources said that there is a sense that the Karnataka government and the state BJP allowed protests by a “small group of students at some pre-university colleges” in Udupi to spread, reach the high court and acquire a national dimension.
